[[Image:The Hobbit Grafton 1992.jpg|thumb|Cover of ''The Hobbit'' Centenary edition by Grafton books, illustration by [[John Howe]]]]
'''Grafton''' (also, '''Grafton Books'''), a British paperback imprint established circa [[1981]] under [[Wikipedia:Granada PLC|Granada Publishing Ltd]], published several books by or relating to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. In [[1983]] Granada Publishing Ltd was sold to the publishers William Collins & Co, and in [[1989]] Grafton became a part of [[HarperCollins]].<ref>[http://208.100.59.10/wiki/index.php/Publisher:Grafton Publisher:Grafton] at [http://208.100.59.10/wiki/index.php/Main_Page Internet Speculative Fiction Database] (accessed 31 May 2011)</ref><ref>[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grafton_(publisher) Grafton (publisher)] at [http://en.wikipedia.org Wikipedia] (accessed 31 May 2011)</ref>

==Publications, selected==
*[[1981]]: ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring|The Lord of the Rings Part One: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' (ISBN 0048231851)<ref name=Amazon>[http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/search/ref=sr_adv_b/?search-alias=stripbooks&unfiltered=1&__mk_en_GB=%C5M%C5Z%D5%D1&field-keywords=Tolkien&field-author=&field-title=&field-isbn=&field-publisher=Grafton&node=&field-binding_browse-bin=&field-subject=&emi=&field-dateop=&field-datemod=&field-dateyear=&sort=relevancerank&Adv-Srch-Books-Submit.x=0&Adv-Srch-Books-Submit.y=0 Advanced Search (Tolkien+Grafton)] at [http://www.amazon.co.uk/ref=gno_logo Amazon.co.uk] (accessed 31 May 2011)</ref>
*[[1981]]: ''[[The Two Towers|The Lord of the Rings Part Two: The Two Towers]]'' (ISBN 004823186X)<ref name=Amazon/>
*[[1981]]: ''[[The Return of the King|The Lord of the Rings Part Three: The Return of the King]]'' (ISBN 0048231878)<ref name=Amazon/>
*[[1990]]: ''[[The Hobbit (comic book)|The Hobbit: Graphic Novel]]'' ([[David Wenzel]]; 46 pages; ISBN 0044408129)<ref>[http://www.amazon.co.uk/Hobbit-Graphic-J-R-Tolkien/dp/0044408129/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1306870794&sr=1-1 The Hobbit: Graphic Novel] at [http://www.amazon.co.uk/ref=gno_logo Amazon.co.uk] (accessed 31 May 2011)</ref>
*[[1991]]: ''[[The Hobbit]]'' (Grafton Books Centenary edition; September 1991)<ref>"[http://www.john-howe.com/portfolio/gallery/details.php?image_id=884 The Hobbit Centenary edition - paperback]" at [http://www.john-howe.com/ John-howe.com] (accessed 31 May 2011)</ref>
*[[1991]]: ''[[The Hobbit Birthday Book]]''
*[[1992]]: ''[[Tolkien - The Centenary Calendar 1992|1992 Centenary Calendar]]'' by [[Ted Nasmith]]<ref name=concise/>
*[[1992]]: ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' (January 1992; ISBN : 0-261-10273-7)<ref>"[http://www.john-howe.com/portfolio/gallery/details.php?image_id=783 The Silmarillion Paperback]" at [http://www.john-howe.com/ John-howe.com] (accessed 31 May 2011)</ref>
*[[1992]]: ''[[The Road to Middle-earth]]'' ([[Tom Shippey]]; revised edition; xvi, 337 pp; ISBN 0-261-10275-3)<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam]], "[http://www.forodrim.org/arda/tbchron.html A Chronological Bibliography of the Writings of J.R.R. Tolkien]" at [http://www.forodrim.org/index_en.html Forodrim] (accessed 31 May 2011)</ref>
*[[1992]]: ''[[The Tolkien Diary 1992]]''
